title: Vanessa Neumann on Energy Executives' Plan For Venezuela
description: Vanessa Neumann, a former Venezuelan opposition representative to the UK and founder of advisory firm Asymmetrica, tells Bloomberg that while many Venezuelans are celebrating Maduro’s removal, lasting investment will depend on maintaining order, ensuring sanctions relief is durable, and restoring basic infrastructure. She joined the conversation on "Bloomberg Markets" with Scarlet Fu. (Source: Bloomberg)
